summary: For those apart of the Stormcloak Rebellion who would like to retreat to a small hideaway to indulge in the arts of alchemy. You can bring one companion with you to this little spot. There is now an Imperial Option for those on the side of the Empire.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]CN [/size][/b][size=4][b]- Silus' Hideaway[/b][/size]
[b] [size=3]Requirements: [/size][/b][size=2]Updated Skyrim + Dragonborn DLC[/size]
[size=5][b]YOU WILL NOT HAVE TO PAY TO USE MY MODS. THEY WILL ALWAYS BE FREE. [/b][/size]
[size=2]The hideaway is only one room, but it can house you and one companion, and there is quite a number of containers tailored to which you can store your gear separately. You can make potions with your alchemy desk and you can make food with the cooking pot. There is also a mannequin for you to use, to put your gear on. [/size][size=1][size=2]It is a basic spot for the player, serving as a good 'stop-by-for-the-day' place for those apart of the Stormcloaks that indulge in alchemy. [color=#6aa84f][color=#f1c232][color=#6aa84f][color=#ffffff]It is situated on a small cliff side, which allows you to look out to Whiterun, but be weary, there are also, wolves about![/color][/color][/color][/color] I made this hideaway for my own play through, but I wanted to share it up, to give back to the community. I hope you enjoy it and if you have any ideas, please share.
[/size][color=#ead1dc][size=4]
[/size][/color][/size][b][size=3]Notes [/size][/b]
[list][*][color=#6aa84f][color=#ffffff]The file has been packed as a BSA.[/color][/color][/*]
[*][color=#6aa84f][color=#ffffff]It has been checked with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url] and cleaned.[/color][/color][/*]
[*][color=#6aa84f][color=#ffffff]None of the containers re-spawn. The items though sitting on the furniture does however. [/color][/color][/*]
[/list]
[color=#f6b26b][size=2][i]"This house uses the same location as this and this mod, move it![/i]"[/size][/color][size=2]
- No. If you want to use a mod that uses the location, then it is up to
you to decide if you will use this or that one. I made it in this
location because it's where I wanted to have a small spot to stay in. If
it really bothers you, it's unfortunate because the only thing I can do
to help is suggest you uninstall.[/size][size=1][color=#6aa84f][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][size=3]
[/size][/color][/size][b] [size=3]Log[/size][/b]
[size=2]1.1
- Moved Stormcloak banner further out, so it does not clip through the wall
- Did further clean of records in TES5Edit
- Corrected spelling to Silus'
[color=#e69138]- Made Imperial Option with applied updates[/color][/size]
[size=3][size=2][b][size=3]
My Other Work[/size][/b]
[/size][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57668/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/tAQYEdN.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58412/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58412-1-1419581431.jpg[/img][/url]
author: BrownPastel
